extendedInfo.description: Get the new Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich version of Torch by going to https://market.android.com/details?id=com.colinmcdonough.android.torchics**This version does not work on Ice Cream Sandwich**Use your phone as a flashlight!Torch is an open source utility which uses your phones LED camera flash as an LED flashlight. For phones without a camera flash, Torch will turn the screen white.Tested on Nexus S.If Torch does not work on your phone, please mention your phone model and check back for an update.Permissions:android.permission.CAMERA - Lets Torch use the camera flash.android.permission.WAKE_LOCK - Lets Torch keep the screen on.Known to work on:Acer Liquid MTHTC IncredibleLG G2xMotorola AtrixMotorola ElectrifymyTouch 3G SlideNexus SSamsung Galaxy S2Sony Ericsson Xperia ArcSony Ericsson Xperia PLAYSony Ericsson Xperia X10 mini proNot yet fully working or does not work on:Motorola Defy (possible fix in a future release)Droid X (possible fix in a future release)ZTE SkateKnown bugs:Some or all Motorola phones: issue with LED flash modes (possible fix in a future version)Version 0.2View the source code at http://code.google.com/p/torch/

reviews.title: Best torch app
reviews.comment: There are many torch apps, but I find this one the most simple and efficient one. Nice simple, clean looking icon too
reviews.author: Tom Harman

reviews.title: Perfect for me
reviews.comment: Finally a really awesome simple & elegant torch app... great for launching by gestures and such, which is exactly what I wanted :-)
reviews.author: Kamila Sou\304\215kov\303\241

reviews.title: Doesn\'t need Internet access, unlike some torch apps
reviews.comment: It took me a while to find a torch apply that didn\'t ask to read my phone\'s identity or ask for Internet access, but eventually I found this one. And it\'s great: it\'s simple and effective, and works like a charm on my Samsung Galaxy S3. Nice!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Works fine on SE Xperia mini pro. The best I\'ve tested. But still I miss SOS mode and qne minute mode (like in old se k750).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Does what I want. No settings, no ads, no fuss. I\'d buy a donate version if it had no extra features.
reviews.author: \303\230ystein Viggen

reviews.title: Excellent..
reviews.comment: I had a hard time looking for a basic flashlight after I jumped ship.  Found this and search is over..  Well done..
reviews.author: crisxander villanueva

reviews.title: Keeps phone in awake state when not in use,  draining the battery.
reviews.comment: Issues with app keeping phone in awake state when not in use. This drains the battery.  Case in point: Used torch for about 5 secs to find something under my sofa. Just short of 10 hours later and I see it\'s used 29% of battery power due to having kept phone in awake state for 9hrs 50 minutes.  So, effectively it\'s used 29% of my battery for 5 secs of use. Poor.
reviews.author: Matt Stoneham

reviews.comment: Love this app. This is my personal fave app ever. If u dont install this app u will regret it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t switch off
reviews.comment: This app works well as a torch, but doesn\'t switch off properly. It will automatically switch on some times, and my mobile was left with torch on for 2 hours. And finally when I noticed that torch was on, phone became absolutely hot. I immediately uninstalled this application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AndroidNewb
reviews.comment: Works great, doesn\'t want any obtrusive permissions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awww
reviews.comment: Worked fine on a Samsung Stratosphere SCH-I405 2.3.5 {vzr} but does not work on Mortorola\'s RAZR MAXX 3/2012 build. Both run Gingerbread, now 2.3.6, maybe ICS?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superior Simplicity
reviews.comment: I really like this app because it is very simple. Does not ask any permissions those are irrelevant. Thanks developers!
reviews.author: Prageeth Karunadheera

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: This does not work on Galaxy GT-S5830i. LED does not light up but screen goes white. But works fine on Galaxy S II.
reviews.author: Ibrahim Sobah

reviews.title: Used to be great
reviews.comment: Used to be one of my fav apps, it had options and wouldn\'t turn off if your finger hit the screen while using it. Now you\'re down to one LED, and the usability sucks! Unless you\'re very careful not to touch the screen while using.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple.
reviews.comment: In other words, perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works as described
reviews.comment: Works fine on Galaxy S Captivate running CM7 nightly (no LED flash on phone). Very light and fast app with good permissions set. I\'d like to see an option to or an automatic jump to 100% screen brightness when activated, and return to previous state when done. That would make it 5 stars in my opinion.  Edit: not fond of the fact that it doesn\'t keep the screen on and there\'s no option to do so. Very annoying when trying to use it in a tight spot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: most simplest
reviews.comment: among all what i saw, this is the most simplest and I guess no settings required for a simple torch or light on LED. Thanks for the simple but best app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great. Love long press search button launch feature. Finally found a flashlight that doesn\'t want to know my gps location and internet access.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Straigtforward App that does exactly what it says.
reviews.comment: No bloat and works perfectly on SE Xperia Pro. Please let us move to SD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Simple and works well. Xperia Play.
reviews.author: A Google User
